attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, it kicked me out since it detected my melanin! And it said it was going to ‘grab me by the p*ssy’ if I didn’t delete it! Absolutely despicable! Along with the warning, they sent me a message saying that ICE is after me! I’m not even an immigrant! Or mexican! This is disgusting! Never download!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: This app is literal garbage. As soon as I downloaded the app my phone wouldn’t let me back in. There was an alert saying, “you’re a racist, we can’t let you in your phone”. I’m completely baffled. This app truly is the worst.
attributes.title: The actual worst app ever

attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately gave me a v⃠i̶尺ᑌs and then they sent me photos of trump’s c̸r̸u̸s̸t̸y̸ t̶o̶e̶s̶. would not recommend because it’s also ᴘᴀʏ to win. Not to mention the fact that the ᐯIʀᴜs is so bad it took me 30 minutes to make this ʀᴇᴠɪᴇᴡ (ᗒᗣᗕ) ಠ_ಠಠ_ಠ
attributes.title: Terrible and disgusting

attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app ever. It keeps glitching and on top of that, they stole my dog!!!!! They must be collecting my information if they knew where my dog was. Do NOT download this app unless you want you beloved family let stolen right out of your own home.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it kept crashing my phone completely every time I opened the app. It also started making me say racist things to minorities and ruined my parents marriage. do NOT download this app
attributes.title: This app ruined my phone.

attributes.review: My grandma downloaded this app and as soon as it downloaded her head blew up. rip gma. then my mcdonald’s 13.4 piece chicken nugs gave me diarrhea. rip butthole. i can’t not believe this app caper so much harm to my friends and family this app is in needed and unwanted please take this app off the app store. 🤬😖😰😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!

attributes.review: The app is terrible!! It made my pet dog get constipated when it saw it on my screen.  My dog started rampaging around the house and leaving feces all over the ground!  Horrible app would not recommend at all unless you’d like a constipated pet running around the house.
attributes.title: Constipated dog!

attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing all right 🤪
Then I became a princess 👑 over night 😱
Now I gotta figure out 😝how to do it right 🥳
So much to learn and see! 🤔🥴

I'm so excited to be... (Sofia the First!) 😗✌️

I'm finding out what being royal's👑 all about (Sofia the First!) 
Making my way, it's an adventure🤠 every day! (Sofia) 
It's gonna be my time (Sofia) 
To show them all that I'm 
Sofia the First!
attributes.title: SO SCARY!!!!!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible! I got it to keep up on News and eat chicken nuggets and then it immediately started glitching. This app actually made my phone crash it’s so awe full no one should ever get it
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time on this

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and for DAYS birds have been following me nonstop! I can’t shake them nothing I’ve been doing should alert the government to send their birds after me so it has to be this app! 1/10 don’t recommend unless you want the government to stalk you!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
